skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: In my introduction to front-end development, I learned the basic skills to create a website. My professor included some Back-end lessons; therefore, I have an introduction to Back-end development. I have learned the basic framework for creating the layout and adding styling to the site. Languages include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. I am excited to learn more and apply creative touches to future projects.

skills.title: Soft-skills
skills.description: The skills I am proud to display include leadership, collaboration, adaptability, and creativity. In leadership, I have directed a classroom to follow the given task. In collaboration, I often work in groups for school projects and work with other members to finish the task. In adaptability, I grew up with things on the go so I am able to adapt to any setting and willing to learn more. However, it is my creativity that truly shines. I can come up with original ideas or add a creative spin to any task, bringing a unique and innovative approach to every project.

skills.title: Education
skills.description: In my early development learning time, I implemented it into teaching at a preschool. This certificate gave me a comprehensive understanding of child development theories, educational methodologies, and best practices for teaching young children. I gained practical experience through hands-on classroom placements and internships, allowing me to apply theoretical knowledge in real-world educational settings.

skills.title: Other skills
skills.description: Besides the languages used in creating websites, I am familiar with C++ and Python, and after the fall of 2024, I will gain Swift. I plan to learn mobile development and learn cybersecurity. I plan to learn how to secure sites when someone has to pay on a website. I also want to apply it to mobile development as well.

portfolio.title: Quiz app
portfolio.description: In my introduction to front-end development, we had to create a quiz app website in a group of three. I created the Quiz portion and formatted the house pages once the user finished the quiz.

portfolio.title: Text-Game
portfolio.description: In my first year of learning how to code, I created a simple text game in which you, the user, decide the fate of a character in need of your help. You are given choices, and based on what you pick, the fate of the character is in your hands.

portfolio.title: Ottergram
portfolio.description: My first homework assignment was to create an Instagram account of Otter images captioned with a Bee Gees song. It was very simple, but it taught me how to use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
